Articles.Content:
Introducing the new Tsiolkovsky B Mun Rocket. Designed for Munar Landing and return missions.

The whole thing packs a total Delta-V of approximately 9,372.169 m/s.

Lots of speed for anywhere you want to go, including Minmus!

Here\'s a picture:

And here\'s Jebediah Kerman on the surface of the Mun with the lander:

I have the Delta-V for each stage also written down if anyone needs to know how to fly their flight. Ride into a 90km orbit and then make TLI with the TLI stage. Use the TLI stage during Munar descent if you have to and land with the lander. That simple.

SHIP DOWNLOAD

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/76061308/Tsiolkovsky%20B.zip
Nice Craft got it into munar orbit but crashed on impact during landing. I would suggest RCS system as it is pretty tough to control the landing stage.
